subtitle: How it works
title: A thoughtful flow from idea to action.

steps.title: Your setup starts with a simple conversation
steps.subtitle: step 01
body: No long forms, no onboarding maze — just start with a quick conversation. As soon as you arrive, the AI greets you and begins a casual, intelligent chat to understand your goals, habits, and what you’re here to build. It’s like talking to a clever co-founder who’s actually listening.

Whether you're brainstorming ideas, organizing thoughts, or setting up a project, the system uses your responses to shape a workspace that feels instantly familiar. It’s a first step that’s simple, fast, and surprisingly fun.

steps.title: Get insights without asking for them
steps.subtitle: step 02
body: Once you're in, the system quietly starts paying attention — but in a good way. It tracks patterns in how you work, what you focus on, and where you spend your time. The result?

Useful, real-time insights without any effort on your part. You’ll start seeing trends, highlights, and even gentle nudges that help you understand what’s working and what’s getting in the way. It’s analytics, but without the overwhelm — just the right amount of clarity to keep you in flow.

steps.title: Get paid without the paperwork
steps.subtitle: step 04
body: When you’re ready to share your work — whether it’s a product, a service, or something entirely new — the system has everything in place.

Built-in payment tools make it easy to accept payments, send invoices, or offer subscriptions without needing extra tools or plugins. It’s secure, fast, and frictionless. You focus on delivering value — we’ll handle the rest.
